title: A Psychophysical Evaluation of Texture Degradation Descriptors

author: Jiri Filip, Institute of Information Theory and Automation, Academy of Sciences of the Czech Republic

segmentation: My name is Jerry Philip and I'm from Institute of Information Theory and Automation of Checker, New Sciences and the title of my work is Psycho.
Physical evaluation of texture degradation descriptors.

The basic idea behind our research is to find some statistics which can describe the difference between two textures in the same way as human vision do and motivation for this research is to help optimize completion.
Are meters of texture compression methods are dependently onto compressed texture with the Step 5 different statistics which we call decoration descriptors?
Those var structure, similarity index, visual difference predictor or carbonari patterns, Gabor filters and cause auto regressive model?
As a test data, we account for view and illumination.

Dependencies use bidirectional texture functions, so we used five different samples and to account for this illumination of independency, we mapped the samples on cubes with different shapes and different illumination from left and right.
Produce some.
Degradation artifacts through data.
We used three different regulation frontals.
First of them also based on sampling of illumination viewing directions and 2nd two are just special filtering of the texture.

To find some relation between the human perception of this degradation artifact and the performance of the tested features, we performed the psychophysical experiment and obtained the results of from 11 subjects.
The tax code is subjects with simple.
They have seen four cubes and one of them was modified by one of the degradation filter and attacks go to subject was to find which which one was modified out of these four.
Results of the subjects.
Differs across different different tested material samples and also different regulation filters to find some.

Or to evaluate the performance of the statistics here we compute the correlation coefficient between subjects, responses and responses of those statistics and the best performance was obtained by the statistics based on local binary patterns and caused auto regressive model.
The auto regressive model as the benefit of shorter feature vector and the same computational time as several company patterns.

There is advantage of the structural similarity index and visual difference predictor is that they are not translationally invariant, so they they are not very useful for comparison of difference between two textures.
So to conclude, we believe that the.
Descriptors based on model is proper for optimizing texture compression and rendering techniques.
Thank you.
